title: Dynamic Preference
body: Since the badges for Dynamic Preference and whatnot came out I have played one ranked duo and the rest I have played solo and I have a Dynamic Preference badge?

replies.body: A Solo Emblem represents a vast majority of solo queue games.  Looking into this for you, I do see a few games played as a premade.  Your emblem can change overtime, and switch to the Solo Emblem as you continue to play without a premade.  More information on ranked emblems can be found [here](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/earn-ranked-emblems-starting-today).  Best of luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TsOmIPcT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-12T15:40:17.363+0000)
>
> A Solo Emblem represents a vast majority of solo queue games.  Looking into this for you, I do see a few games played as a premade.  Your emblem can change overtime, and switch to the Solo Emblem as you continue to play without a premade.  More information on ranked emblems can be found [here](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/earn-ranked-emblems-starting-today).  Best of luck!

I got the dynamic badge and i dont recall ever queing with more than 1 person more than once.
It looks like you play a good mix of solo and duo queue ranked matches, Defended.   Your emblem will update as you continue to play more solo matches.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TsOmIPcT,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T15:54:54.695+0000)
>
> It looks like you play a good mix of solo and duo queue ranked matches, Defended.   Your emblem will update as you continue to play more solo matches.

Exactly though, Why does Duo somehow equal dynamic? I mean id be fine with it but doesnt dynamic mean more than 2?
Well, Dynamic is opposed to Solo. What does "2" fits more, between Solo and Dynamic?

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBurs7,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TsOmIPcT,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T19:18:05.502+0000)
>
> Well, Dynamic is opposed to Solo. What does "2" fits more, between Solo and Dynamic?

There is a solo a duo and a dynamic badge.

There is no duo badge. It's solo, dynamic, and teams.

You get the solo badge when the majority of your last 25 wins are solo.

You get the dynamic badge when the majority of your last 25 wins are with premades of mixing sizes.

You get the teams badge when the majority of your last 25 wins are with a premade party of only 4 or 5.

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TsOmIPcT,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T19:31:59.714+0000)
>
> There is no duo badge. It's solo, dynamic, and teams.
> 
> You get the solo badge when the majority of your last 25 wins are solo.
> 
> You get the dynamic badge when the majority of your last 25 wins are with premades of mixing sizes.
> 
> You get the teams badge when the majority of your last 25 wins are with a premade party of only 4 or 5.

Dynamic que = ability to queue with more than 2 people right? Thats what was changed from solo Q. Solo Q you could queue with 1 other person in the old system correct..?

So why would dynamic queue mean 2,3,4 when solo queue was 1 or 2... I dont queue with 3 4 or 5 people i never do. Ive had 1 game with a 3 man premade in the past 3 weeks and that was it. So i dont deserve a ''dynamic badge'' when ive done nothing but solo qued or qued with a friend. Majority of my games are solo tho

Yes you could queue up with one other person in the old system, but that isn't technically a "solo queue," it's a duo queue. At least, that's how it is to me. We could argue about how we feel certain things should be, but as far as these badges are concerned, Riot programmed the system so that the solo queue badge is strictly for queuing alone.

Also, the badges don't care about all of your games, they only care about your last 25 wins. If the majority of your last 25 wins you were queued up with at least 1 friend, then you will get the dynamic badge.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/earn-ranked-emblems-starting-today

> [{quoted}](name=Zombiemaster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TsOmIPcT,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T20:01:10.719+0000)
>
> Yes you could queue up with one other person in the old system, but that isn't technically a "solo queue," it's a duo queue. At least, that's how it is to me. We could argue about how we feel certain things should be, but as far as these badges are concerned, Riot programmed the system so that the solo queue badge is strictly for queuing alone.
> 
> Also, the badges don't care about all of your games, they only care about your last 25 wins. If the majority of your last 25 wins you were queued up with at least 1 friend, then you will get the dynamic badge.
> 
> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/earn-ranked-emblems-starting-today

Like i said before. Majority of my games are solo Q. No reason to have a dynamic queue badge. There are countless Threads of people who have done nothing but solo qued, then played with a duo for 3 games and got the dynamic badge.
My Man thx for your statements I hope you still read this cuz I got the same problem lol it's stupid I never trio Q and rarely duo Q so wtf is this shitt about man ?
I too received dynamic preference, though i only duo queued back 2 divisions ago
Is there somewhere i can see how many games i played solo, duo, 5 man, etc.?
Exactly the same. 24 of my last 25 games were solo, i get a dynamic badge.

Noticing this is still an issue. Out of the 165 games played in ranked, of the 87 wins as well as the 25 games it asked for once badges were released to get my solo badge I was able to hold onto it for 1 day because after 3 ranked games in a row with some pals I met it changed my preference to Dynamic. I've played 3-4 ranked games since, still Dynamic even though this entire season I have made it a personal goal to climb solo. With under at most 10 games of the 165 with anyone other than myself, there is something obviously wrong with the system. I've already read that it works as a 'vast' majority of ranked games being solo, I'd consider 155 solo games in ranked to be vast. I did what you asked and got the solo badge from the 25 wins alone and after all of that you take it away after 3 games? I honestly want to know what's going on with this system I've played an extra equal number of solo games and I know the badge isn't much but it's a nice reminder of what I've done for those moments when tilt starts to hit.
I almost never rank with anyone else so I don't know why I have dynamic queue when I rank alone
I'm also having this issue. For sure more than half of my last 25 wins were solo, yet I got a dynamic badge. What's up with that?
